resources.string: Do You really wish to delete all your Selfie Photos?

An application that periodically reminds the user to take a selfie. Over time the user will capture many selfies and thus will be able to see him/her change. The user can also set an alarm that notifies him/her every 24 hours after the alarm is set. For testing purposes, this alarm has been configured for notification on every 2 minutes. For setting the alarm, please select Set Alarm.
